website_summaries.verdict: After a rocky launch, the GoPro Karma is available for purchase. but there are better drones on the market at lower prices.
pros: Works with Hero4 and Hero5 cameras
cons: GoPro camera not ideal for aerial work
Remote screen is prone to glare
Omits obstacle avoidance and follow mode

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Karma is not a reliable drone! Its stabiliser become faulty and shakes after two weeks. The guarantee didn't accept it as manufacture problem!!! Which means I paid £600 for a piece of faulty item that I can not work with. NEVER TRUST KARMA AND ITS CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.author: Amin

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Real value for money as the Karma grip gimbal is also included. I've had some fun with this drone, just waiting to take it on holiday to Tokyo to really test its capability. But from my current usage the drone handles very well, the only downsides I'd say is that the battery life does drain quicker than expected, and when travelling with other camera equipment, the size of this drone is not very convenient. But still a value for money product if you already have a GoPro
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: incredible! amazing item
customer_reviews.text: shame it has been discontinued, the drone and the associated add ons in the bag are great fun and really practical! the gimble is really cool to use, can see why it alone is valued at 300! the drone with my hero 7 black, looked movie quality!
customer_reviews.author: Customer London

customer_reviews.title: thank you...
customer_reviews.text: Prompt and efficient service. Item as described. Very pleased,. Delivery company exceeded expectations and date provided. Item arrived day earlier than expected outcome. Brilliant, thanks.
customer_reviews.author: ISSA

customer_reviews.title: the fans were easy to break
customer_reviews.text: The GPS was faulty, which led to falling and not landing safely, the fans were easy to break, just very fragile and not reliable. Not worth the price to pay for such a product
customer_reviews.author: Raibs

customer_reviews.title: Reach for the sky with my Hero 5 GoPro
customer_reviews.text: Great drone, fly's very easy and camera gimbal is so smooth. Amazing value for money as this this makes more use of my GoPro camera with the grip included in the deal.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product and extremely well thought out
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product and extremely well thought out. The arial photography is amazing, it's just a shame that spare batteries for Karma are not readily available!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Morison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing machine would recommend this to anyone thinking about buying fantastic buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive five minutes !
customer_reviews.text: Looks great first flight took off then it lost connection and shot off and disappeared in to the sea ! Gone forever ! Help Seems a common problem ! Losing signal and crashing ! Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: simon t

customer_reviews.title: Mine fell out of the sky on its second flight but Amazon are fantastic as they handled the problem very proactively and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Please don't buy as there are still battery problems. Mine fell out of the sky on its second flight but Amazon are fantastic as they handled the problem very proactively and I ordered a DJI Mavic Pro.
customer_reviews.author: Graeme Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Losses control, no response from company don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Present, Go Pro losses control and lands in a lake. Only used twice 😢. Not happy, don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: GoPro KARMA Drone with Harness for HERO5 Camera - Black/White
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Drone for Hero 5 CameraKarma captures amazingly smooth GoPro footage in the air, handheld or body mounted. Ultra portable, Karma folds to go anywhere, packed in its own lightweight case. Detach the camera stabilizer and combine it with the included Karma Grip for unbelievably smooth handheld or body-mounted footage.This harness is the key to accessing all Karma features. It mounts your HERO6 Black or HERO5 Black to the Karma Drone and Karma Grip. Integrated smart technology lets you remotely control your camera, see a live view of what Karma sees and more.

BOX CONTAINS
Karma Drone Karma Controller with Touch Display Karma Stabilizer Karma Grip Handle Karma Harness (HERO5 Black) Karma Charger Karma Battery 6 Propellers Karma Mounting Ring Karma Case ​ (Camera sold separately)
feature_bullets: Karma captures amazingly smooth GoPro footage in the air, handheld or body mounted.
The Karma Drone folds to fit into the included lightweight case. Take it anywhere. When you’re ready to fly, just unfold, attach the propellers and go.
The Karma Stabilizer captures breathtaking shake-free video both in the air and on the ground.
Device Compatibility : iOS 9 and later Android 4.4 and later
Karma Drone Karma Controller with Touch Display Karma Stabilizer Karma Grip Handle Karma Harness (HERO5 Black) Karma Charger Karma Battery
